divs: sighting details(copied the e-mail witness sent me-adam mason -fi 10332) i am writing to someon from mufon to describe it in unusual siting. this occurred sometime ago in northern michigan. the craft can best be described as a hugely elongated propane tank.tank i saw it airborn for four or 5 minutes in the daytime with crystal blue skies. of course, these are estimates for an unknown craft. i would say that it was 30 to 40 feet in diameter and two or 300 feet long. both ends were rounded and it looked all the world like a long propane tank. during the few minutes i saw it traveling slowly above the tree line.it slowly moved in profile from my right to left. again another guess, i think it was at eight or 10,000 feet. it traveled across the highway i was slowly driving down and began to turn towards me traveling just left of the highway. i saw the object from the side, the front, and underneath. i have heard discussion regarding this common shape and also seen a similar craft on ufo programming. the flying propane tank had two distinct characteristics that i would like to discuss was someone who has a good historilogical knowledge of similar shaped crafts. my name is [cms\tg\pid] and i can be reached at [cms\tg\pid] or [cms\tg\pid]
Summary: Man driving saw a propane shaped craft flying in the sky, Craft later turned and witness drove underneath the craft.
